boat.name: Lista Light
boat.full_description:
Built in Flekkefjord Norway.

67’ including bowsprit.

Treenail fastened carvel planks.

Full keel.

Lost in September 2022 after running aground in a narrow buoyed channel heading into Norderney on one of the notorious shifting sand banks. The German coastguard rescue vessel was unable to tow her off and as waves and currents got bigger, she began to take on water. The crew had to evacuate and leave her to her fate. She broke up within an hour.
boat.short_description:
Norwegian fishing vessel, converted to private sailing vessel in 1974. Spruce on spruce, Ribs 9 x 5.5 inches at 18” centres.

Perkins 6345.
